Smart Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush that uses sensors to track the user's brushing habits and provides personalized feedback and recommendations for improving oral hygiene.
Toothbrush with Built-In UV Light: Incorporate a UV light into the toothbrush handle to kill bacteria and viruses that can collect on toothbrush bristles, making it safer to use.
Toothbrush with Self-Sanitizing Bristles: Create toothbrush bristles that are coated with an antibacterial agent that kills germs and bacteria, reducing the risk of oral infections.

Toothbrush with Augmented Reality: Develop a toothbrush with an augmented reality feature that provides visual feedback and guidance on proper brushing techniques, making it easier for users to improve their oral hygiene.
Toothbrush with Built-In Water Flosser: Integrate a water flosser into the toothbrush handle, allowing users to clean between their teeth without the need for additional devices.
